input.description: The timeout value is seconds. This is the time after which the command will timeout regardless of whether the command execution is complete or not.
domain-name [Required] Specifies the name of the policy domain to which the schedule belongs. Valid values: The domain-name whom the associated schedule belongs to.
schedule-name [Required] Specifies the name of the schedule from which clients are to be disassociated. Valid values: The schedule-name which is involved in the association.
nodes-name [Required]: The node(s) associated with targeted association. Multiple nodes can be separated by commas with no intervening spaces. Valid values: nodesâ€™ name of the targeted association.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">delete-association</xsl:text> </operation-name> <timeout-secs> <xsl:value-of select="'${timeout secs}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </timeout-secs> <command-options> <domain-name> <xsl:value-of select="'${domain name}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </domain-name> <schedule-name> <xsl:value-of select="'${schedule name}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </schedule-name> <nodes-name> <xsl:value-of select="'${nodes name}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </nodes-name> </command-options> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This wrapper generates item xml for - delete association operations.
